thread.section_title: Fourth London Terror attack victim named as Leslie Rhodes – Metro
thread.title: Fourth London Terror attack victim named as Leslie Rhodes
thread.title_full: Fourth London Terror attack victim named as Leslie Rhodes

author: Tanveer Mann
title: Fourth London Terror attack victim named as Leslie Rhodes
text:
Emergency services at the scene outside the Palace of Westminster on Wednesday after a policeman was stabbed (Picture: PA) A 75-year-old man who died in the Westminster terror attack has been named as Leslie Rhodes, from Streatham, Scotland Yard has said. 
The victim died from his injuries overnight after his life-support was turned off.
He is the fourth victim to have succumbed to his injuries following the deadly attack on Wednesday.
Police say they have made two more ‘significant’ arrests overnight
More follows. 
MORE: London terror attacker’s birth name was Adrian Russell Aja 
MORE: Man, 75, becomes fifth person to die following London terror attack
